snippet: A federal appeals court has declared California's same-sex marriage ban unconstitutional.
abstract: A federal appeals court has declared California's same-sex marriage ban unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: Today's Appeals Court decision in California overturning Proposition 8, the ban on same-sex marriage enacted by referendum on the same day the first African American was elected president, is not as broad as I'd hope it would be.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
